title: Asmodeus Tiefling
content:
Asmodeus Tiefling Racial Features Base Racial Speed Darkvision (12m) Hellish Resistance Subrace Traits Infernal Legacy

Asmodeus Tiefling

Base Racial Speed Darkvision (12m) Hellish Resistance

Asmodeus Tiefling is a Subrace of Tiefling in Baldur's Gate 3. Asmodeus Tieflings have Darkvision and Hellish Resistance as racial bonuses. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them
